org.keedio.flume.source

类 SQLSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flume.source.AbstractSource
      • org.keedio.flume.source.SQLSource
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flume.conf.Configurable, org.apache.flume.lifecycle.LifecycleAware, org.apache.flume.NamedComponent, org.apache.flume.PollableSource, org.apache.flume.Source

    public class SQLSource
extends org.apache.flume.source.AbstractSource
implements org.apache.flume.conf.Configurable, org.apache.flume.PollableSource
    A Source to read data from a SQL database. This source ask for new data in a table each configured time.

    作者:
    Marcelo Valle
